name: Add products to Shopify from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a selected Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new product in Shopify. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1--j6eGa6eroVWYVhU62WuQVgdco0yb0zU7vZrhLeya4/edit#gid=0).
